title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data using tools like Excel, SQL, and Python.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop engaging UIs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop and maintain backend systems using Flask, Django, and SQL.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build complete applications from frontend to backend.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and train ML models using Python, sklearn, and TensorFlow.

title: Data Scientist
description: Work with large datasets, build predictive models and derive insights.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design intuitive interfaces using Figma, Adobe XD, and user research.

title: Digital Marketing Executive
description: Run SEO, SEM and social media campaigns.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product lifecycle with roadmap planning and market analysis.

title: Business Analyst
description: Bridge business needs with tech teams and analyze solutions.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate CI/CD pipelines and manage deployments.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor threats, secure systems, and perform vulnerability assessments.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop smart contracts and dApps using Solidity and Ethereum.

title: AI Researcher
description: Explore artificial intelligence and deep learning models.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Deploy and manage apps on AWS, Azure or GCP.

title: Android App Developer
description: Build mobile apps using Java or Kotlin.

title: iOS Developer
description: Develop iOS applications with Swift and Xcode.

title: QA Tester
description: Perform manual and automated testing using Selenium.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual content for digital and print media.

title: Content Writer
description: Write articles, blogs, and SEO content.

title: Technical Writer
description: Write documentation, guides, and tech manuals.

title: Mechanical Engineer
description: Design mechanical systems using CAD tools.

title: Electrical Engineer
description: Work with power systems, circuits, and embedded systems.

title: Civil Engineer
description: Plan and execute construction and infrastructure projects.

title: Finance Analyst
description: Analyze finances, budgets, and investments.

title: HR Executive
description: Manage hiring, onboarding, and employee experience.

title: Operations Manager
description: Ensure smooth business operations and logistics.

title: Sales Associate
description: Handle B2B/B2C sales and client interaction.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description: Resolve customer issues via chat/email/call.

title: Teacher/Educator
description: Deliver educational content in a school or online setting.

title: Biotech Researcher
description: Work in labs conducting biological research.

title: Pharmacist
description: Dispense medicines and counsel patients.

title: Environmental Engineer
description: Work on sustainability, pollution control, and environment safety.

title: Legal Associate
description: Assist in drafting, legal research and documentation.
